name: Math Up (Keat)
description:
A simple game to test concept of 2D platform while learning Maths. 

Features

  • Highscore
  • Resource: Coins collecting (meant for future developer)
  • 4 sets of mathematic of your choice from addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

** Sidenote ** A dropped project which was meant for Facebook Instant Games. The only thing that putting me off from proceeding with the project was enrolling Apple Developer Programme which costs $99 (In Malaysia, RM408) - a huge blow to my wallet.
